title: RSS Search
description: Searches user-specified RSS feeds with a user-specified query. Returns top_n matches (default: 10).

query.title: Search query
query.description: A search string to match against the RSS feed items

feeds.title: RSS Feeds
feeds.description: List of RSS Feed URLs to search from

top_n.title: Top N results
top_n.description: Number of top matches to return
